title: 15 best early Prime Day deals: 4K TVs, Echo Dot, Ring, Echo Buds, and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: See today's best early Prime Day deals on Amazon devices
article: Prime Day deals have arrived at Amazon just days away from the official sale event. The retail giant has dropped fantastic bargains on its best-selling devices, including 4K TVs, the latest Echo Dot, the Ring Doorbell, Echo Buds, and bundled deals on the all-new Echo Show 5. We've sorted through today's offers to bring you the 15 best early Prime Day deals that are happening right now.

Some highlighted offers from Amazon's early Prime Day sale include this Insignia 50-inch 4K Fire TV on sale for $299.99 (was $379), the Echo Auto on sale for a record-low price of $14.99 (was $49.99), and the Echo Buds on sale for $79.99 - $20 less than the previous all-time low price. Leaving the best for last, Amazon is offering two Echo Dots for the price of one when you apply the coupon code PDDOT2PACK at checkout. The latest Echo Dot currently retails for $49.99, so with this deal, you're saving 50% off for both smart speakers - a fantastic bargain. Shop more early Prime Day deals below and keep in mind you must have a Prime membership to partake in today's sale. If you're not a member and you can sign up for a 30-day free trial, which will take you through the upcoming Amazon Prime Day sale.
You can shop for more of the best Amazon Prime Day Echo deals that are happening right now and the best Amazon Prime Day TV deals.
